snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton on Sunday left New York on a two-day road trip to Iowa, making literal her pledge in a video announcing her presidential campaign that she would be “hitting the road to earn your vote.”
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton on Sunday left New York on a two-day road trip to Iowa, making literal her pledge in a video announcing her presidential campaign that she would be “hitting the road to earn your vote.”

headline.main: Was That Hillary Clinton Pumping Gas?
